Posts.Content: Hello my name is Michelle. I know this might seem weird but I am on here for my mother. Im trying to find a way to pay for her treatments. She refuses to take any support from me and I am lost I live about four hours away from her so it's a bit harder helping her out but if you have guidance to give on the financial part of it please let me know I appreciate it. Good Luck and God Speed!
Posts.Title: I HAD A DOUBLE(BOTH BREAST) NEEDLE GUIDED BIOPSY YESTERDAY!
